title: Kids CALM Sweet Citrus Flavored Gummies
author: Sign In
description: Support a balanced mood and healthy development with Natural Vitality CALM® for Kids Gummies, a magnesium supplement with sweet citrus flavor. Supports muscle, heart, brain and nervous system health* Helps replenish healthy magnesium levels* Delicious sweet citrus flavor with only 1 gram of sugar per gummy Packaging may vary
cleaned_text: Natural Vitality CALM® Kids CALM Sweet Citrus Flavored Gummies Support a balanced mood and healthy development with Natural Vitality CALM® for Kids Gummies, a magnesium supplement with sweet citrus flavor. - Supports muscle, heart, brain and nervous system health* - Helps replenish healthy magnesium levels* - Delicious sweet citrus flavor with only 1 gram of sugar per gummy - Packaging may vary Kid-Friendly Magnesium Supplements Natural Vitality CALM® for Kids Gummies help to promote balanced mood and healthy development. Made with magnesium, these gummies support healthy development of the brain, nervous system & muscles and supports heart health. With a delicious citrus flavor, each gummy is vegan and gluten-free with a sweet taste kids will love.* For children 4-12 years: chew and swallow one gummy per day. Children 13 years and older: chew and swallow up to four gummies a day. Not recommended for children under 4. See product label for complete directions. Key Features at a Glance - Magnesium - Less than 1g of added sugar per gummy - Does not contain: gluten, milk, egg, soy, wheat or artificial flavors
